title: agentF
author: agentF
content: Hey !I'm looking for someone who can deliver Custom Bitcoin Ticker Device from A to Z.Examples of a devices (my design would be much better) https://www.amazon.com/Bitcoin-Ticker-Crypto-Cryptocurrency-tracker/dp/B09KMRLP52At first, i'll need two tickers if everything works well, i'll be ordering massively. ESCROW is a must unless you got high reputation and i can go first.Been scammed once already.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: @agentF Does it have to be this specific Bitcoin Ticker device, or something similar would also work for your use case?If you are interested in alternative devices I can send you more information here or with personal messages.Please note that I can't do any delivery service for this devices.

comments.author: agentF
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on February 28, 2023, 11:52:02 AM@agentF Does it have to be this specific Bitcoin Ticker device, or something similar would also work for your use case?If you are interested in alternative devices I can send you more information here or with personal messages.Please note that I can't do any delivery service for this devices.It needs to be a custom design, too bad, your reputation is high
